languages.text: "И я молюсь за тебя. Свет Терры ведет нас сквозь тьму, но ты — та сила, что не дает сбиться с шага".

traits.locale_text: "И я молюсь за тебя. Свет Терры ведет нас сквозь тьму, но ты — та сила, что не дает сбиться с шага".

languages.text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."
languages.original_text: "И я молюсь за тебя. Свет Терры ведет нас сквозь тьму, но ты — та сила, что не дает сбиться с шага".

traits.locale_text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."
"And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."
"And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."
"And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."
"And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."

languages.text: “还有，我为你祈祷。泰拉之光指引我们穿越黑暗，而正是你的力量，才让我们没有偏离正道。”
languages.original_text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."

traits.locale_text: “还有，我为你祈祷。泰拉之光指引我们穿越黑暗，而正是你的力量，才让我们没有偏离正道。”

languages.text: «Y yo rezaré por usted. La luz de Terra es lo que nos guía por las tinieblas, pero usted es la fuerza que evita que abandonemos el camino que marca».
languages.original_text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."

traits.locale_text: «Y yo rezaré por usted. La luz de Terra es lo que nos guía por las tinieblas, pero usted es la fuerza que evita que abandonemos el camino que marca».

languages.text: 「それから、御身のために祈るとしよう。地球の光は暗闇の中を導いてくれるが、陛下は我らが正しい道から逸れないように支えてくれる力なのだ」
languages.original_text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."

traits.locale_text: 「それから、御身のために祈るとしよう。地球の光は暗闇の中を導いてくれるが、陛下は我らが正しい道から逸れないように支えてくれる力なのだ」

languages.text: "Und ich bete für Euch. Terras Licht führt uns durch die Dunkelheit, doch Ihr seid die Kraft, die uns davon abhält, vom Pfad abzukommen."
languages.original_text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich bete für Euch. Terras Licht führt uns durch die Dunkelheit, doch Ihr seid die Kraft, die uns davon abhält, vom Pfad abzukommen."

languages.text: « Et je prie également pour vous. Si la lumière de Terra nous guide à travers les ténèbres, vous êtes la force qui nous empêche de nous écarter du droit chemin. »
languages.original_text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."

traits.locale_text: « Et je prie également pour vous. Si la lumière de Terra nous guide à travers les ténèbres, vous êtes la force qui nous empêche de nous écarter du droit chemin. »

languages.text: "Senin için dua ediyorum. Bize karanlıkta yol gösteren şey Terra'nın nuru olsa da bizim bu yoldan ayrılmamamızı sağlayan güç sensin."
languages.original_text: "And I pray for you. Terra's light is what guides us through the darkness, but you are the force that keeps us from straying from the path."
